dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 922 IH: Northern Border Regional Commission Reauthorization Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Michaud (for himself, Ms. Pingree of Maine, Mr. Welch, Ms. Shea-Porter, and Mr. Owens) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to extend the authorization of the Northern Border Regional Commission, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Northern Border Regional Commission Reauthorization Act of 2013.

subsection.text: Section 15751 of title 40, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting after subsection (a) the following:

subsection.text: There is authorized to be appropriated to the Northern Border Regional Commission to carry out this subtitle $30,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2014 through 2018.

paragraph.text: in subsection (c), as so redesignated in paragraph (1) of this subsection, by inserting by the Commission, if in that fiscal year at least $10,000,000 is made available to the Commission under this section before the period.

subsection.text: Subtitle V of title 40, United States Code, is amended by redesignating chapters 1, 2, 3, and 4 as chapters 151, 153, 155, and 157, respectively.
